entry.title: WIND WARNING , Tofino
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:44 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain and Fog, 8.3°C

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 except gusting to 100 over exposed coastal sections late this afternoon. Temperature steady near 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
